title: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway sells more Bank of America, has now cut stake by nearly 15%
content: Warren Buffett has added around $6 billion to Berkshire Hathaway's sizable cash pile this summer with a string of Bank of America stock sales since mid-July.
